Name: ARTH
Description: ARTH is a decentralized non-depreciating algorithmic form of currency, that ensures stability in buying power over time as opposed to stability in price.The ARTH Valuecoin ecosystem will be implemented systematically over two well-planned phases. Phase 1 is intended to posit the concept and lineup of the preliminary components in order to test the model. Phase 2 on the other hand, will build on the former to ensure that the ecosystem is viable, stable, and sound, ready for mass adoption.Telegram | Discord | MediumDocs
